    • About Colemere Realty

    Hi! I am Bryan Colemere, co-owner of Colemere Realty and a Third Generation Realtor, Colemere Realty has been selling real estate in Utah for 66 years. I dedicate Utah Real Estate Top Producer to all Realtors aspiring to do more; not only in the pursuit to earn a living, but in taking the service they provide their clients to the next level. Two years ago I had a vision to build a Real Estate Team in Utah by focusing on 2 things: First, by helping make each agent on my team better by offering 30 leads a month, weekly training, coaching, and accountability, and second, by remembering that our primary goal must always be to provide the best service possible to the clients with whom we serve! By making these our priority our team has tripled its number of sales over the past few years. My hope for this Mastermind is that it provides a community in which agents aspiring to do more can trade ideas, ask questions, and post concerns in and around the real estate industry in the Salt Lake & Surrounding areas. I want to give back, not only to my team, but to anyone seeking to be more.

    Bryan Colemere
    Colemere Realty
